text: All good <@U04HLBUT9QC> I found the bug on my code :slightly_smiling_face: Thanks fo all
Curious to know what you want you want the tooltip to look like <@U03BA1PRV7S>? Can you show me why you need a line break in the tooltip?
<@U05KNCMAE7N> It is for a dropdown where the user selects a score and I want to explain what each score mean in an organized way so the user can read that and know which score to select.
I wonder if with the future side panel component I can show a table showing all this information in a table for all the 5 scores instead of putting it in the tooltip :thinking_face:
Oh, I see:memo: Thanks for that. Yes, panel can definitely be a way of showcasing extra information. Might make it easier to read as well
<@U05KNCMAE7N> sounds good. I'll wait for the panel to be live then :smile:
